messages: b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:00): Well, then download it and test it

b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:00): mngrif: What are you talking about?
b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:01): You can get the beta version from CVS

77a0088b192815bdb2c93d01675b706a (02:04): anyone know of chrooting howto for netbsd? links please
b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:05): pinPoint: Just untar the disk sets you get on any install CD
290f8f69e5f219585deda5db1ff4fd56 (02:05): pinPoint: chroot works the same everywhere its implemented
77a0088b192815bdb2c93d01675b706a (02:05): for a user so they can use the basic features
b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:06): |23:04| ( sjamaan) pinPoint: Just untar the disk sets you get on any install CD
b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:06): Those disk sets are available via FTP
b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:07): Alternatively, you could mount_nullfs the directories you want to have inside the chroot
b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:08): But of course that only works if you want everything in such a directory to be available in the chroot
77a0088b192815bdb2c93d01675b706a (02:10): it wanted gzip in the chrooted environ.
507513131f229ebebd0b2f66abecd759 (02:20): I assume there are no nbsd live cds, if not are there any OS that has live cds which builds on nbsd?
b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:21): There are certainly netbsd live cds
b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:21): In fact, you can build your own with mklivecd in pkgsrc
7f9c5e64ca9ab8d2ee03704097fd58cc (02:21): there are, there just aren't many places to download them. someone posted a URL to an .iso last week on this channel.
b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:21): I think xtraeme made one available
507513131f229ebebd0b2f66abecd759 (02:22): I'm a obsd user, but would like to checkout the support for my laptop hw in nbsd.
507513131f229ebebd0b2f66abecd759 (02:23): sjamaan: do you have any clue where I can find it?
b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:28): xtraeme: It might be an idea to discuss auto-building of liveCDs with releng
b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:28): xtraeme: The demand is increasing
507513131f229ebebd0b2f66abecd759 (02:29): it's only kde pkgs that bugs with obsd actually. as much as I've experienced.
b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:30): kde works fine on nbsd
b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:30): Well, not a release version
b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:31): I'm not sure if it's actually unstable, of course :)
b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:38): Just try them all for a while
ba1e7f35f4a7498cb44387faeb8ea7c2 (02:39): my better half will give birth soon , we'll be driving to the hospital so i guess i see you in a couple of days
ba1e7f35f4a7498cb44387faeb8ea7c2 (02:39): watch the channel guys and keep it a nice place
ba1e7f35f4a7498cb44387faeb8ea7c2 (02:41): daveBSD: the father is me in both cases
ba1e7f35f4a7498cb44387faeb8ea7c2 (02:41): luckilly for xtraeme he'll have a pretty kid now
b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:41): I bet you guys have the same milkman
b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:45): UdontKnow: Hmm, better not do that when 4.0 is released, then :)

b2ffda25cfed2e1adeff06e4fb2f7901 (02:48): It's much more lightweight than Gnome afaik
